attributes.action: compulsory kitting out of our canine heroes in bulletproof kit and face shields Ensure our canine heroes are protected as much as our human heroes.
attributes.additional_details:
Ensure our canine heroes are protected as much as our human heroes.
We bury our canine heroes with military honours yet we do not give them any protective clothing, It has been known for soldiers to shield their canine companions with their own bodies when under fire but this should not be needed, Our canine soldiers are as worthy as humans to be protected when in the line of duty. This is a call to try to protect ALL serving dogs whether they be police or military or any other types of active service, Please help me change the rules and give our four legged loyal friends the protection they need and deserve when on active service.

Face shields and body protection for ALL.

Please help me make a difference.
